Prime, ye hot headed leader, Maximals, Night Shift, Straight Shot, Rattrap,=
 Quickstride and Uproar.  You'll meet them all as you go along.  Anyway, ho=
pe you enjoy the show.

Perpetually on the move and constantly busy.
